testcase.system-out: Given To launch the browser and maximize window.............................passed When To launch the url of fb................................................passed And To click the create new account button..................................passed And To pass firstname in firstname text box.................................passed And To pass surname in surname box..........................................passed And To pass mob or email in email box.......................................passed And To create new password in new password box..............................passed Then To close the browser...................................................passed
